entry.title: AkshayPanchivala/fast-ai-text-summary: fast-ai-text-summary is a lightweight and blazing-fast Node.js package that summarizes large blocks of text into concise, meaningful sentences using basic NLP and frequency-based extractive summarization. Ideal for chatbots, content previews, reports, and AI assistants. Easy to use and customizable.
